name: The Battle of Ivrea
description: Tyler Drinkwater of the West Village restaurant Dell’anima has proved how well wine, rum and bitters can work together. This drink is named after the Italian city where residents re-enact the Battle of the Oranges and pelt each other with the fruit.

recipeInstructions.text:
In a mixing glass, muddle the
fruits.

Fill with ice, add the
other ingredients and shake.
Strain into a highball over ice.

Float the Moscato on top.
Garnish with a lemon twist.
